InitialFeedbackHistory: 01/02/2023 [REDACTED] [REDACTED] data on portable hard drives is risky, since the datasets in your table are all <1GB you can store everything on the more safe and secure onedrive, for other alternatives please have a look at the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] Please note that the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy asks for the preservation of all relevant data for 10 years [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you don't mention any restrictions on sharing, consider using a data repository for sharing, journals may also request this, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing 01/02/2023 [REDACTED] [REDACTED] data on portable hard drives is risky, since the datasets in your table are all <1GB you can store everything on the more safe and secure onedrive, for other alternatives please have a look at the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] Please note that the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy asks for the preservation of all relevant data for 10 years [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you don't mention any restrictions on sharing, consider sharing your data in a repository, journals may also request this, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
